mapper.select: SELECT level, me,company_code,parent,uploader,file_name,upload_date,c_size,forder,c_name,department_no,rank_id,c_form FROM (SELECT * FROM CLOUDS WHERE company_code = #{companycode} ) WHERE PARENT IS NOT NULL START WITH PARENT is null CONNECT BY PRIOR ME = PARENT AND LEVEL =2

SELECT level, me,company_code,parent,uploader,file_name,upload_date,c_size,forder,c_name,department_no,rank_id,c_form FROM (SELECT * FROM CLOUDS WHERE company_code = #{companycode}) WHERE PARENT IS NOT NULL AND PARENT = #{parent} START WITH PARENT is null CONNECT BY PRIOR ME = PARENT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLOUDS(me,company_code,parent,uploader,file_name,upload_date,forder,rank_id) VALUES((SELECT MAX(me)+1 FROM CLOUDS WHERE company_code = #{companycode}) ,#{companycode},#{parent},#{uploader},#{filename},sysdate,'Y', (SELECT rank_id FROM RANK WHERE rank_name = #{rankname} AND company_code = #{companycode}) )
